detail_desc: Belt in a nylon weave with an adjustable metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Elasticated satin scrunchies.
Elasticated satin scrunchies.
Metal hair grips. Two plain, one with rhinestones, one with plastic beads and one with a shimmering pearly plastic bead. Length from 5 cm to 6 cm.
Large hair grip in metal with beaded text. Length 9 cm.

Jacket in cotton twill with a high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pockets and patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud. Concealed drawstring at the waist and cuffs with metal press-studs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in satin with a round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a concealed zip at the back. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbow, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, softly draping skirt. Lined at the top.

Calf-length dress in satin with a round neckline, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a concealed zip at the back. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbow, a seam at the waist and a gently flared, softly draping skirt. Lined at the top.
Short-sleeved shirt in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Chest pocket, and short slits in the sides.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high stand-up collar and zip with a plastic pearly bead tab. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with pearly plastic beads.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Small, decorative eyelets around the neckline and cuffs.
Long-sleeved playsuit in sequined, glittery jersey with a deep V-neck and draped detail at the front. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, and short, wide legs.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a small fabric appliqué at one end.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a small fabric appliqué at one end.
Tube scarf in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with a small fabric appliqué at one end.

Trousers in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and a small fabric appliqué on the front. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Cardigans in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves. The cotton content of the cardigans is organic.

Dungarees and a short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton. Dungarees in woven fabric with buttons at the sides, straps with adjustable buttoning, a chest pocket and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.Covered elastication at the back of the waist and around the hems. Top in jersey with a press-stud on the shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Dungarees and a short-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton. Dungarees in woven fabric with buttons at the sides, straps with adjustable buttoning, a chest pocket and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.Covered elastication at the back of the waist and around the hems. Top in jersey with a press-stud on the shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Set in soft, organic cotton jersey. Three short-sleeved bodysuits with a wrapover front and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch. One romper suit with short sleeves, short legs and off-centre press-studs down the front and along one leg. Two pairs of trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. One hat with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem and one pair of scratch mittens with ribbed cuffs.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in soft, double-weave organic cotton with short, narrow shoulder straps and a button placket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and covered elastication at the hems.

Full-length, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Round neckline and an opening with a decorative metal tube bead at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a raw-edge hem.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front. Long sleeves and flounces at the front that continue over the back of the shoulders.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, button placket and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Short-sleeved romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with buttons down the front and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.
Short, straight-style, double-breasted coat in woven fabric containing some wool. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders and large patch pockets at the front. Lined.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Jumper with a round neck and long sleeves. Wide trousers with an elasticated waist and decorative grosgrain bow.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Jumper with a round neck and long sleeves. Wide trousers with an elasticated waist and decorative grosgrain bow.

Baby Exclusive. Dress in an organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Buttons at the back, 3/4-length sleeves with flounced trims, a gathered seam at the top and a gently flared skirt. Lined in a cotton weave.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a high, elasticated waist, high slit at the back and overlocked hem.
Jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in lightweight, organic cotton denim. Straps with adjustable buttoning at the front, patch pockets and buttons at the sides. Unlined.
Satin-covered Alice band with glittery, shell-shaped appliqués on top and curly hair extensions at the sides.
Sun visor in braided straw with contrasting colour elastic at the back.

Calf-length shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and decorative gathers at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw with an indented crown and wide grosgrain band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and narrow elastication at the hem.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.

Long dress in heavily draping, pleated jersey with a deep V-neck and wrapover top, and a cut-out section at the back. Seam with a wide, patterned, elasticated band at the waist and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Lined skirt and lined front.

Long dress in heavily draping, pleated jersey with a deep V-neck and wrapover top, and a cut-out section at the back. Seam with a wide, patterned, elasticated band at the waist and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Lined skirt and lined front.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.
Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Wide trousers in a soft wool weave. High waist with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets, two welt back pockets and straight legs with pleats at the top for volume.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and button placket. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Set with a T-shirt and dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on each shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Dungaree shorts in an airy weave with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined at the top.

Set with a T-shirt and dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on each shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Dungaree shorts in an airy weave with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable buttoning, buttons at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined at the top.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless blouse in an organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Buttons at the front, a small flounce at the shoulders, a gently gathered yoke and a scalloped hem. Lined in a cotton weave.
Hat in crocheted paper straw. Width of brim 7 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave with elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs. Wide cotton jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Short skirt in a sequined weave with a concealed zip at the back. Satin lining.

Boiler suit in stretch cotton twill with a collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Zipped chest pockets, side pockets and a seam at the waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Wide, gently tapered legs.
Metal studs in various designs. Size from 0.8 cm to 1.6 cm.
